channel.title: At what ages do you go to the doctor?
channel.description: I was wondering.. I want to smoke some pot but I don't want to get caught with a piss test. If you know the ages, could you let me know? I thought it was like.. 3, 5, 9,12 and then up to like 16

item.title: At what ages do you go to the doctor?
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

A waterfall bong involves needed water though… Then again… No I’ll just fill it up first… Then I’d have to keep my thumb over the hole the whole time… Oh well…

Well, I suppose I’ll just smoke it in the wash… Yea well anyway thanks guys

Read full topic
item.source: At what ages do you go to the doctor?

item.title: At what ages do you go to the doctor?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Just go wherever you feel safe and that you wont get caught?

It’s not something I would worry about, we used to do it on the street on the way to school everyday. Unless for some reason a cop is coming to walk by I don’t think you have to worry.

Read full topic
item.source: At what ages do you go to the doctor?

item.title: At what ages do you go to the doctor?
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

Hehe, sounds pretty good

I’m no conveniently close to an allies…

Theres also a wash (the ‘river’ thingy for rain) behinnd my house, seems like decent place.[quote=“r0bert, post:6, topic:78681”]go into your bathroom
and turn the air
then turn your shower on really hot so steam is everywhere
the smell wont sink into the walls
and lock the door and act like your in thw shower
you wont get caught i swear[/quote]
That sounds easy enough, but I want to smoke it with my friend the first time so that wont work for now, I’ll keep it in mind though. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: At what ages do you go to the doctor?
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

OkieDokie, sounds good…

I guess I’m getting $10 of weed (“a dime bag”), and using a waterfall bong

I’m gonna do it with my friend on the golf course, which is conveniently close to my house. Or not… Any recommended places?

Read full topic
item.source: At what ages do you go to the doctor?

item.title: At what ages do you go to the doctor?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Um, what?

I mean, I just had a blood and urine test for the first time in my life and that was because my appendix exploded. They still didn’t find any drugs. They wont find them unless they specifically look for them, which costs money.

If you know you have an appointment to test for drugs, which is really weird to have something randomly thrown at you, just don’t smoke pot for about 2 weeks before and drink lots of water.

Read full topic
item.source: At what ages do you go to the doctor?

item.title: At what ages do you go to the doctor?
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

uhg… I hate vinegar… and I dont have it lol

Well, just once, but I know they do it some other time. Or not… I dunno. How effective would it be to fill up a cup with water and be like… “Yea I’ve only drinken water for about three days…” ?

Or if your lucky and someone pissed in the toilet before you scoop

Then to find out they smoked crack lol

Read full topic

Just smoke and if you have a doctors appointment, drink loads of water and vinegar
